enhanced_by.reason: The peek method requires elements in the queue to be present, which can be ensured by using the offer method to add elements.
The synchronizedQueue method initializes the queue that the peek method operates on, ensuring the queue is properly set up.
The poll method can be invoked after peek to verify that the element returned by peek is the same as the one removed by poll.
The element method can be invoked before peek to ensure that both methods return the same element when the queue is not empty.
